definition: to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: The first chapter is the judicial judgments of traffic accident crime.
sentences.chinese: 第一章为交通肇事罪的司法认定。

sentences.english: ChengKang found driving end be chafed, cognizance is concise.
sentences.chinese: 承康发现座驾车尾被擦花，认定是简洁所为。

sentences.english: Nudism, the council decided, was doing the resort more harm than good.
sentences.chinese: 委员会认定在休闲胜地的裸体行为弊大于利。

sentences.english: The judge found him guilty of unpardonable evil.
sentences.chinese: 法官认定他的罪行十恶不赦。

sentences.english: Other circumstances in which the experts' conclusion cannot be as the evidence upon the cross-examination.
sentences.chinese: 经过质证认定不能作为证据使用的其他情形。

sentences.english: The americans decided penkovsky was a provocation.
sentences.chinese: 美国人认定潘科夫斯基的事是一种圈套。

sentences.english: The company may have decided that the Emdrive could not work.
sentences.chinese: 这些公司可能会认定Emdrive无法工作。

sentences.english: Hope hurries up and finds you.
At school teachers couldn’t decide if I was really stupid or really intelligent.
sentences.chinese: 在大学之前老师不能认定我真的很笨或者很聪明。

sentences.english: He had made up his mind that Johnson was guilty, and he steamrollered anyone who disagree with him.
sentences.chinese: 他已经认定约翰逊有罪，并迫使任何持异议者就范。

sentences.english: Not listening to an interviewee whom you've decided is a rambler, etc.
sentences.chinese: 你认定其是个夸夸其谈的人，所以就不听了，等等。

sentences.english: I have had a background check done by security and have been found to be a Safe Person.
sentences.chinese: 安检部门对我的背景来历核查过，认定我为人可靠。

sentences.english: Thirdly, loan losses and write-off criteria are too strict and cumbersome.
sentences.chinese: 贷款损失的认定和核销标准过于严格和繁琐。

sentences.english: How, then, can IRGC companies be identified?
sentences.chinese: 那么如何认定这些革命卫队公司呢？

sentences.english: The principle of discretional evaluation of evidence is a principle system which was acknowledged by many countries.
sentences.chinese: 自由心证制度是近现代各国事实认定的原则性制度。

definition: to infer/to consider and come to a judgment/to recommend/to estimate/deduced to be
to determine the nature (usually of error or crime)/to determine chemical composition/qualitative/fixed
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to investigate and find out/to ascertain
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
